name: Complete Frontend Design
desc: Finalize the design for the user dashboard and integrate it with the backend.

name: Backend API Development
desc: Develop and test the API for user authentication and data management.

name: UI/UX Feedback Implementation
desc: Incorporate the feedback from user testing into the design prototype.

name: Code Review for Feature X
desc: Review the code submitted by the team for the new feature before merging.

name: Finalize Project Documentation
desc: Complete the documentation for the project, including API references and user guides.

name: Test Database Migration
desc: Test the migration of data from the legacy system to the new database schema.

name: Set Up DevOps Pipeline
desc: Establish the CI/CD pipeline for automated testing and deployment.

name: Create Unit Tests for Feature Y
desc: Write unit tests to cover the new functionality in Feature Y.

name: Security Audit
desc: Conduct a full security audit to identify potential vulnerabilities.

name: Prepare Sprint Review Presentation
desc: Prepare the presentation for the upcoming sprint review meeting.
